resources.string: RE-ARRANGE THE LETTERS TO FORM A WORD BASED ON THE GIVEN STATEMENTS. ACQUIRE TEN (10) POINTS TO UNLOCK THE NEXT LESSON.

GUESS AN ALTERNATIVE WORD BY SUGGESTING LETTERS. EACH CORRECT LETTER GUESSED WILL REVEAL ITS POSITION IN THE WORD. HOWEVER, INPUTTING THREE INCORRECT LETTERS WILL RESULT IN FAILURE. ACQUIRE TEN (10) POINTS TO UNLOCK THE NEXT LESSON.
CHOOSE THE CORRECT ANSWER FROM THE CHOICES PROVIDED TO COMPLETE THE SENTENCE. ACQUIRE TEN (10) POINTS TO UNLOCK THE NEXT LESSON.
MATCH ITEMS FROM “TRADITIONAL” TO THE ITEMS IN THE “ALTERNATIVE” WORDS PROVIDED. ACQUIRE TEN (10) POINTS TO UNLOCK THE NEXT LESSON.
Getting 10 points will advance you to the next lesson!
What do ypu know about the Republic
